notes: The projectile travels at a speed of 1500.
Roots the target, preventing it from moving and casting certain mobility spells. Provides True Sight over the target, but only when the target was not invisible or within a fade time upon hit.
Successive casts on the same target do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.

description: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.
trivia: The particle effects of Cripple include runes resembling the Elvish scripts from The Lord of the Rings, a novel by J.R.R. Tolkien (specifically the alphabet bee or umbar in Tengwar).
tips: Root is a great disable to make a melee hero unable to reach his target and attack and later to force them to use their Black King Bar while out of position.
This item can be combined with a Bloodthorn and/or a Necronomicon to get more attacks off.
Combine it with an Hurricane Pike to push away your target then root him for preventing your enemy from attacking or escaping.
The item can be used for ganking, chasing survivors after a team fight, or to escape.
The very long cast range makes the Rod of Atos an effective item to disable an enemy Linken's Sphere from afar, although it requires the projectile to connect.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 240 health, 1.2 health regen, 0.96% magic resistance, 1.92 armor, 12 attack speed, 0.6% movement speed, 240 mana, 1 mana regen, 1.4% spell damage and 12 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 240 health, 1.2 health regen, 0.96% magic resistance, 1.92 armor, 12 attack speed, 0.6% movement speed, 240 mana, 1 mana regen, 1.4% spell damage and 12 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 240 health, 1.2 health regen, 0.96% magic resistance, 1.92 armor, 12 attack speed, 0.6% movement speed, 240 mana, 1 mana regen, 1.4% spell damage and 20 attack damage.
